```{r}
library(eulerr)

s <- c(A = 4, B = 6, C = 3, D = 2, E = 7, F = 3,
       "A&B" = 2, "A&F" = 2, "B&C" = 2, "B&D" = 1,
       "B&F" = 2, "C&D" = 1, "D&E" = 1, "E&F" = 1,
       "A&B&F" = 1, "B&C&D" = 1)

bench::mark(one = {euler(s, shape = "ellipse", n_threads = 1)},
            two = {euler(s, shape = "ellipse", n_threads = 2)},
            three = {euler(s, shape = "ellipse", n_threads = 3)},
            four = {euler(s, shape = "ellipse", n_threads = 4)},
            check = FALSE)

```
